name: Morty
line: Hey Rick, I have to make a project for the science fair this weekend. You think you could help me out?

name: Rick
line: Whatever.

name: Jerry
line: Well, um, traditionally science fairs are a father-son thing.

name: Rick
line: Well, scientifically, traditions are an idiot thing.

name: Beth
line: [typing on phone] Morty, I think it will be fun for you to work on a science project with your dad.

name: Morty
line: [putting away phone, clears throat] Yeah, dad, why don’t we do it together?

name: Jerry
line: Yes! You backed the right horse on this one, son! We’ll get out the crayons, brew some coffee and knock this thing out in two or three days.

name: Butter robot
line: What is my purpose?

name: Rick
line: Pass the butter.

name: Rick
line: Thank you.

name: Morty
line: [sighs]

name: Summer
line: Dad, I need a ride to work.

name: Jerry
line: Maybe Rick can give you a ride. I’m helping Morty with science.

name: Rick
line: I’m busy.

name: Summer
line: Doing what?

name: Rick
line: Uh, anything else?

name: Butter robot
line: What is my purpose?

name: Rick
line: You pass butter.

name: Butter robot
line: [looks at its hands] Oh my god.

name: Rick
line: Yeah, welcome to the club, pal.

name: Rick
line: Since when did you have a job?

name: Summer
line: Since last week. It’s part time at this little vintage thrift store. My boss is this really smart eccentric old man that treats me nice and values me.

name: Rick
line: Wee-ow, can’t wait to meet this fascinating character.

name: Summer
line: Please don’t.

name: Goldenfold
line: Oh… when did this stop being jamba juice?

name: Needful
line: I’ve just recently opened for business, Mr, um, Goldenfold.

name: Goldenfold
line: You know my name? That’s disarming.

name: Needful
line: I also know you long for female company.

name: Goldenfold
line: You know, it has been lonely since the divorce. Some voids can’t be filled with jamba juice.

name: Needful
line: This aftershave makes a man quite irresistible to women. Free of charge

name: Goldenfold
line: Nothing to read into there! Thanks!

name: Summer
line: Sorry I’m late, Mr. Needful. This is my grandpa Rick, he was just leaving.

name: Rick
line: (inspecting objects) Huh.

name: Needful
line: Tell me Rick, what do you desire?

name: Rick
line: Eh, I make my own stuff. So what are you, like, the devil?

name: Needful
line: What? Sorry?

name: Rick
line: I dunno, store comes out of nowhere, all the shit’s old and creepy; are you the devil? A demon? Leprechaun?

name: Summer
line: Grandpa Rick!

name: Rick
line: Hey, I’m not judging. I just like to shoot straight. I’m a man of science.

name: Needful
line: Ahah. Then perhaps you could make use of this. [picks up microscope] This microscope reveals things beyond comprehension. Hahahaha.

name: Rick
line: Hahahahaha.

name: Summer
line: Grandpa, go home and drink!

name: Jerry
line: Why don’t we do a model of the solar system? That’s what my dad did with me when I was your age.

name: Morty
line: Oh. Ok.

name: Jerry
line: You know, Rick’s in his lab making cyborgs and wormholes and all that weird stuff, but this is real science! A man and his boy, making planets! Hey, how ‘bout we use a ping-pong ball for Pluto, and then Jupiter-

name: Morty
line: Uh, actually, I don’t think Pluto’s a planet.

name: Jerry
line: [laughing] Of course Pluto’s a planet, son, I learned that in the third grade.

name: Morty
line: Well, yeah, but, you know, they changed it.

name: Jerry
line: Morty, nobody changed the planets.

name: Morty
line: I just googled it. Uh, Pluto’s not a planet. They changed it in 2006.

name: Jerry
line: Yeah, I heard about that, Morty. And I disagree.

name: Morty
line: You… disagree?

name: Jerry
line: That’s right. It’s possible to disagree in science, Morty. Pluto was a planet, some committee of fancy assholes disagree, I disagreed back. Gimmie a ping-pong ball.

name: Morty
line: Um, ok, I just have to-

name: Jerry
line: Go find Rick and go for my head about Pluto?

name: Morty
line: Gee-no! Geez! I just gotta go to the bathroom! Damn!

name: Jerry
line: Oh. [coughs] Okay good. This is gonna be fun!

name: Rick
line: Hey, Morty, lemme ask you a question real quick. Does evil exist, and if so, can one detect and measure it?

name: Morty
line: Um…

name: Rick
line: Rhetorical question Morty. The answer is yes, you just have to be a genius.

name: Rick
line: Your sister’s boss gave me a microscope that would have made me retarded.

name: Morty
line: Ooh, oh boy Rick, I don’t think you’re allowed to say that word, you know?

name: Rick
line: Uh, Morty, I’m not disparaging the differently abled. I’m stating the fact that if I had used this microscope, it would have made me mentally retarded.

name: Morty
line: Okay, yeah, but I don’t think it’s about logic, Rick. I think the word’s just become a symbolic issue for powerful groups that feel like they’re doing the right thing.

name: Rick
line: Well that’s retarded.

name: Jerry
line: What are you guys talking about?

name: Rick
line: Apparently nothing.

name: Jerry
line: You asked him if Pluto’s a planet, didn’t you?

name: Morty
line: No!

name: Rick
line: It’s not.

name: Jerry
line: Shut up, Rick.

name: Rick
line: Whoa.

name: Jerry
line: I don’t care what anyone says. If it can be a planet, it can be a planet again. Planet. Planet, planet, planet.

name: Rick
line: Stay scientific, Jerry.

name: Goldenfold
line: This aftershave made women want me but it also made me impotent!

name: Needful
line: A price for everything, Mr. Goldenfold. A price… for everything! Muahahahaha!

name: Goldenfold
line: (crying) Oh my god! How can I not see this coming? My lust! My greed! I deserve thi-

name: Rick
line: This serum should counteract the negative effects.

name: Goldenfold
line: [looking into own pants] Holy cats! Ladies, let’s get out of here.

name: Goldenfold (outside)
line: I haven’t learned a thing!

name: Rick
line: [giving back microscope] Here. You can have this back.

name: Needful
line: You didn’t use it?

name: Rick
line: Sure I did. To develop this. It detects and catalogues all your Twilight Zone Ray Bradbury Friday the 13th of series voodoo crap magic. I thought you might want it so you didn’t accidentally sell anybody, say, [scans] a typewriter that generates best-selling murder mysteries, then makes the murders happen in real life? Oooh.

name: Needful
line: Be quiet!

name: Rick
line: Don’t you want to make sure people know what they’re getting? You’re not intentionally selling [scans] beauty cream that makes ugly ladies pretty but also makes them blind?

name: Needful
line: I find this all quite preposterous!

name: Rick
line: Oh, I say, good sir! Oh, harrumph, oh, oh, bobba-doppa-doopa-bo-bo. [scans animal fur scarf being tried on by customer] That’s beautiful, you know it’s going to be wearing you in three hours?

name: Needful
line: Do I need to call the police?

name: Rick
line: Here, you can use my phone. Don’t worry, it won’t make you deaf because I’m not a hack.

name: Summer
line: Hey! No! Ugh!

name: Rick
line: Think you’re so great?

name: Summer
line: Stop it!

name: Summer
line: No! Stop! Hey, hey! Stop it right now!

name: Summer
line: Grandpa Rick, I like working here!

name: Rick
line: You work for the devil!

name: Summer
line: So what?

name: Rick and Needful
line: "So what"?!

name: Summer
line: Yes, so what if he’s the devil, Rick? At least the devil has a job. At least he’s active in the community. What do you do? You eat our food, and make gadgets. Buh bye.

name: Rick
line: Whoops.

name: Summer
line: I’m sorry Mr. Needful, I’ll clean that up. I don’t know what I can do about the ghost lady that came out of it, but…

name: Needful
line: It’s fine. Summer, you know your grandfather’s right. This store curses people. That’s my business.

name: Summer
line: Well, yeah, fast food gives people diabetes and clothing stores have sweatshops. Is there a company hiring teenagers that isn’t evil? This is my first job. You’ve been nice to me, Mr. Needful. You respect me.

name: Needful
line: Please, call me the devil.

name: Summer
line: I’d rather not, actually.

name: Needful
line: Yes, perhaps not during business hours.

name: Jerry
line: I told you, I want to file a declaration that Pluto is a planet! … Well, then my son’s going to fail his science class, and when that happens, I’m suing you first! [hangs up] I think I know what the A in NASA stands for.

name: Morty
line: Dad, what’s your endgame?

name: Jerry
line: Ain’t no game, sucka.

name: Morty
line: Why don’t we just make the solar system with eight planets? It’s even easier!

name: Jerry
line: Sure, sure, and why don’t we just burn Galileo at the stake for saying the sun is round? Science isn’t always easy, Morty!

name: Jerry and Morty
line: Whoa, whoa! Whoa!

name: Jerry
line: What the hell?

name: Flippynips
line: I’m King Flippynips, ruler of Pluto!

name: Flippynips
line: We discovered you quite by accident during routine surveillance of your world. You really gave it to those guys at NASA!

name: Jerry
line: I was… you know… sometimes science is about conviction.

name: Flippynips
line: I’d like to introduce you to a few people that very much agree with you.

name: Jerry
line: Oh. I…

name: Flippynips
line: Plutonians! Jerry Smith is a scientist from Earth where he’s creating a model of our solar system! Jerry, tell Pluto about your decision!

name: Jerry
line: Pluto… is a planet.

name: Flippynips
line: Pluto’s a fucking planet, bitch!

name: Morty
line: [to himself] Oh man, this is definitely gonna go to his head.

name: Needful
line: If it’s athletic prowess you desire, principal Vagina, I might-

name: Vagina
line: [taking ball] I’ll take it!

name: Needful
line: But I haven’t even-

name: Vagina
line: Thank you very very much, great store, great place, bye.

name: Needful
line: Huh. Okay. I must say, Summer, I thought your grandfather’s outburst would have disrupted business, but this is the best weekend I’ve had since Salem!

name: Summer
line: Nice! Wholesome delight for lunch?

name: Needful
line: Is that the vegan place?

name: Summer
line: Yeah, I love their soup.

name: Needful
line: I’m kind of souped out.

name: Needful
line: Mrs. Tate, is it? What do you desire?

name: Needful
line: Whoa, whoa, slow down, honey!

name: Tate
line: Oh, is there a limit? Everything’s free, right?

name: Summer
line: Let’s just say… you don’t pay with money. [laughing]

name: Needful
line: [laughing] That was perfect.

name: Tate
line: You pay with the curses, right?

name: Needful
line: Um, I… well-

name: Needful
line: But Mrs. Tate! Why do you want cursed items?

name: Tate
line: Well, I’m going to get the curses removed. At curse purge plus. You know, the guy on TV?

name: Needful
line: What?

name: Rick (TV)
line: Have you acquired creepy, specific old stuff from an antique or thrift store that gives you powers but fucks with you in unforeseeable ways? Bring it to Curse Purge Plus! I use science to uncurse the items for cash, and you get to keep the powers! This guy got mysterious sneakers to make him run faster! But guess what? He would have had to run until he died, making them worthless. I removed the curse, making them worth, like, I dunno, $8,000,000? See ya at the Olympics. This eerily intelligent doll was threatening to murder its family. Now it does their taxes.

name: Baby (TV)
line: Everything’s deductible.

name: Rick (TV)
line: Don’t pay for cool stuff with your soul. Pay for it with money. You know, like how every other store in the world works? We’re located at First and Main in old town. Come on, come on down.

name: Needful
line: First… and…

name: Rick (TV)
line: Wubba… lubba… dub dub!

name: Rick (Outside)
line: Wubba lubba dub dub!

name: Rick (TV)
line: That’s right across the street from Needful Things, where you can get evil items for free!

name: Needful
line: Diabolical son of a mother-

name: Hostess
line: We’re back on Good Morning Pluto, and a very good morning it is for our guest, Earth scientist Jerry Smith, who is making headlines with his bold announcement that is, what Jerry?

name: Jerry
line: Pluto is a planet.

name: Host
line: [laughing] How about that?

name: Hostess
line: Wow. I love it!

name: Scroopy Noopers
line: Morty Smith. I’m Scroopy Noopers. I’m a scientist. Can I show you something?

name: Morty
line: Uh… I’d better not.

name: Scroopy Noopers
line: [pulling out a gun] Right now.

name: Scroopy Noopers
line: The centre of Pluto, Mr. Smith, is made up of a substance called plutonium. Mines like these suck Plutonium up to the cities, where corporations use it to power everything, from diamond cars to golden showers. And the more we remove, the more Pluto shrinks.

name: Scroopy Noopers
line: There it goes again. Just shrank a little. But a few years ago, your scientists had noticed Pluto had gotten so small they couldn’t even call it a planet any more. Should have been our wake up call. But the rich plutonians won’t wake up. And they love your dad telling everyone Pluto’s a planet, because that means they can keep mining until Pluto goes from planet to asteroid to meteor, and finally, poof. [At the last word, he blows a handful of blue dust into the air]

name: Morty
line: Um… A party?

name: Scroopy Noopers
line: Is everyone in your family an idiot?

name: Morty
line: For sure me and my dad are.

name: Scroopy Noopers
line: [sigh] Well, all you have to do is get him to admit that, and you could save four billion lives.

name: Morty
line: Uh, yeah, you know, the thing is… my dad’s really insecure.

name: Summer
line: Hm, funny. Mr Needful, out of everything in the store you’ll never guess what we couldn’t get rid of!

name: Summer
line: Ah! Oh my god!

name: Summer
line: Oh my god. (using monkey paw) I wish this desk was lighter!

name: Summer
line: (using monkey paw) I wish this knot was looser!

name: Summer
line: Come on! I don’t… Augh! Wait! What am I doing? (using monkey paw) I wish I knew CPR!

name: Summer
line: One, two, three! One, two, three!

name: Needful
line: [coughing] Ugh, Jesus. What a waste of a monkey paw.

name: Summer
line: Mr. Needful! How could you even think of doing something so horrible?

name: Needful
line: I’m the devil. What should I do when I fail, give myself an ice-cream?

name: Summer
line: You haven’t failed.

name: Needful
line: People like Rick are making me obsolete. I mean seriously, I may be the devil but your grandpa is the devil! I just want to go back to hell where everybody thinks I’m smart and funny.

name: Summer
line: No! It’s not fair. Everyone in this town got something they wanted from you, even Rick! I was your only friend, and I get nothing?

name: Needful
line: Okay, I’ll give you one thing. Name it.

name: Summer
line: I wanna help you.

name: Needful
line: Clever twist.

name: Summer
line: I learned from the best, you old fart. Now let’s go get you hydrated.

name: Rick
line: Looks like we’ve got… haunted boxing gloves that will make you the heavyweight champion, in 1936 and then you’ll be trapped there winning the same fight for eternity. I can take out the eternity, and the padding, and then you’ll have some time travelling mittens.

name: Rick
line: Oh, look, it’s Rosemary’s baby! How’s business?

name: Summer
line: Here’s the last of our inventory. We’re going to file chapter 11 and do some restructuring.

name: Rick
line: Sounds like code for ‘You win, Rick!’

name: Summer
line: That was important to you, wasn’t it?

name: Rick
line: Nope, it was important to your dumb devil friend. To me this was all just a bit like when Bugs Bunny fucks with the opera singer for twenty minutes.

name: Summer
line: He tried to kill himself.

name: Rick
line: Seriously? Holy crap. Holy crap.

name: Summer
line: But you know what, grandpa Rick? He’s strong. And he’s never going to give up.

name: Rick
line: Uh huh, yeah, I don’t care.

name: Summer
line: Oh, I know. Everyone knows you don’t care.

name: Rick
line: So?

name: Summer
line: So… have fun not caring.

name: Rick
line: I always do.

name: Summer
line: Good.

name: Rick
line: Yeah, it is good. It’s the best.

name: Summer
line: I’m sure it is. Bye.

name: Rick
line: Later!

name: Customer
line: I’m here to pick up my undead cat and child.

name: Rick
line: Yeah, uh, gimmie a sec.

name: Employee
line: These are the forms for the employee health plan.

name: Rick
line: Alright, yeah, uh, put ‘em on my… eh.

name: Rick
line: I just got bored. Everybody out.

name: Jerry
line: Alright, just one more rally, then I promise, we’ll get back to your science project.

name: Morty
line: Dad, Pluto isn’t a planet! It’s shrinking because of corporations!

name: Jerry
line: Yeah, that’s what that anti-planet nutjob Scroopy Noopers was screaming about outside the Ministry of Moneys fundraiser. Are you telling me four billion plutonians are wrong?

name: Morty
line: You told me science wasn’t easy!

name: Jerry
line: I said science isn’t always easy, obviously that means sometimes it is easy. Let’s not debase ourselves with word games, son.

name: Morty
line: Dad, their whole planet is dying!

name: Jerry
line: Hah! You called it a planet! Checkmate.

name: Jerry
line: What’s up, Pluto?

name: Plutonian woman
line: Mr. Smith, please! Tell my friend here what you just told me, go on.

name: Jerry
line: My Very Eager Mother Just Served Us Nine Pickles, and the pickles is Pluto.

name: Plutonian man
line: My god! The man’s a genius!

name: Morty
line: Um, excuse me? [taps champagne glass with spoon]

name: Jerry
line: Morty, what?

name: Morty
line: Dad, what did you think about the recent report published by the Pluto Science Reader, linking plutoquakes, sinkholes and surface shrinkage to deep core plutonium drilling?

name: Jerry
line: ...Well son, what did you think when you were five, and you pooped your pants, and you threw your poopy undies out your bedroom window because you thought it was like throwing something in the garbage?

name: Plutonians
line: [laughing]

name: Jerry
line: I mean, I’m trimming the hedges and these things are just hanging there, was I supposed to think the poop bunny left them?

name: Morty
line: Good one, dad.

name: Rick
line: [looks into Morty’s room] Hey Morty, you wanna go on a- oh. [goes into kitchen] Hey Beth? Hello? [Goes into living room] Hey Jerry, you in here being stupid? [sighs]

name: Rick
line: Thanks. Hey, y’know, I was thinking I might watch a movie…

name: Butter robot
line: I am not programmed for friendship.

name: Rick
line: Suit yourself.

name: Rick
line: Hey! [clears throat] Hey. What’s going on?

name: Morty
line: Um… listen, can you help me do this stupid science fair project?

name: Rick
line: Whatever.

name: Flippynips
line: Jerry, you must be so excited! The Plutobell Prize is the highest honour a scientist can receive!

name: Jerry
line: I’m flattered, and humbled.

name: Flippynips
line: Ooh, I like that. Use that in your speech. Also, talk about Pluto being a planet, people like that.

name: Policeman
line: Your highness! We’ve captured Scroopy Noopers!

name: Scroopy Noopers
line: You animals! Animals!

name: Flippynips
line: Ooh, look whose little journey’s come to an end! Take him to Plutonimo Bay!

name: Scroopy Noopers
line: You can’t kill the truth, father!

name: Jerry
line: What?

name: Flippynips
line: I can see you’re confused. Plutonimo bay is a military prison, a sort of play on words-

name: Jerry
line: Did he call you father? Scroopy Noopers, the anti-planet nutjob is your son?

name: Flippynips
line: The young eat the old if you let them, Jerry. Pluto is a cold, cold celestial dwarf.

name: Jerry
line: It’s a what?

name: Flippynips
line: Huh? Oh- planet! Hah! Hoh, Pluto is a cold cold planet! That’s what I meant. Knock ‘em dead out there, you. [sips champagne]

name: Jerry
line: Pluto is…

name: Jerry
line: [sigh] Not a planet.

name: Crowd
line: Boo! [throws things]

name: Jerry
line: Ow! It’s not a planet! Hey! It’s not a planet! I’m an idiot, and I love my son!

name: Needful
line: It’s been a long six hours, but we’ve overhauled Needful Things into the globally compliant, web 4.0 e-nomenon, n33dful.com! Spelled with 3s instead of Es.

name: Crowd
line: Woot! Yeah! Woot! Excited!

name: Needful
line: Okay, that’s it! We just got bought by Google!

name: Crowd
line: Yeah!

name: Summer
line: Mmh! I’m so proud of you, Lucius. So… how much did we make?

name: Needful
line: Haha. ‘We.’ [pushes Summer away] This is my business! Security!

name: Summer
line: Ah! You’re Zuckerberging me?

name: Needful
line: I was Zuckerberging people before Zuckerberg’s balls dropped. I’m the devil, beeyotch! What what!

name: Jerry
line: Hey!

name: Jerry
line: Hey Morty.

name: Morty
line: Oh! Hey dad! [closes laptop] Um… What are you doing back from Pluto so quick?

name: Jerry
line: Ah, some people just can’t handle the truth. Especially dummies like me. Morty, I’m not as smart as your grandpa Rick, but I promise never to make that your problem again.

name: Morty
line: Hey, dad? Nobody’s smarter than Rick. But nobody else is my dad. You’re a genius at that.

name: Jerry
line: Wow… that’s humbling… and flattering, son. Thank you. What say we finish ourselves an 8-planet solar system?

name: Morty
line: Um… I’m just going to take this thing in and… get an A. [Holds up butter robot]

name: Butter robot
line: Butter.

name: Jerry
line: But-

name: Morty
line: You’re a genius at being my dad, dad. Quit while you’re ahead. And also, knock next time, you know? I mean, I’m sitting in here, I’m 14! I got a computer in here, you know!

name: Jerry
line: Oh. I uh- I think I underst-

name: Morty
line: You know you’re really playing with fire when you burst in here like that, man.

name: Jerry
line: I get it! Say no more.

name: Morty
line: I mean, one of these days, you know, you’re gonna, you’re gonna end up seeing something-

name: Jerry
line: I got it! Noted! Goodnight!

name: Rick
line: How’s your pretend grandpa doing AKA the devil?

name: Summer
line: He dumped me.

name: Rick
line: Oof, sorry.

name: Summer
line: Did we learn a lesson here I’m not seeing?

name: Rick
line: Hm, not sure.

name: Summer
line: Maybe in a much bigger way, Mr. Needful gave us both what we really wanted? Because I was always jealous of you hanging out with Morty and you didn’t realise how much you valued my approval?

name: Rick
line: No, that’s dumb.

name: Summer
line: Nah, not satisfying.

name: Rick
line: I’ll tell you what though, if it’s satisfaction you’re after, I think I might have an idea. [whispers]

name: Summer
line: [listening] Uh huh… uh huh… uh huh totally let’s do it!

name: Needful
line: And that’s how I took my storefront into the forefront of the upfront! Thank you Seattle!

name: Needful
line: Rick? Summer?

name: Rick
line: Stupid mother-

name: Summer
line: Stupid bitch!

name: Rick
line: Stupid motherfucker!

name: Summer
line: Get some!

name: Rick
line: How do you like that! Augh! How do you like that?

name: Needful
line: Ugh… Why?

name: Summer
line: (lifting Mr. Needful by the neck of his shirt) Because sometimes what you really need is for someone else to pay a horrible price.

name: Rick
line: We did it!

name: Summer
line: Haha, yeah bro. Yeah! Haha!

name: Rick
line: Was totally worth it! We did it, hahaha! We just pulled it off!

name: Summer
line: Yeah bro!

name: Rick
line: Hahaha!

name: Summer
line: Yeah.
